requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a property file to allow a simple configuration
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster.properties file allows to customize the behavior of xmlBlaster.
requirement.example:
The xmlBlaster.properties file is searched in the following locations and the given order:
1. $HOME user.home
2. $XMLBLASTER_HOME e.g java -DXMLBLASTER_HOME=/opt/xmlBlaster ...
3. Local directory .
4. java.home e.g. /opt/jdk1.2.2/jre/lib
5. Fallback: \xmlBlaster or /usr/local/xmlBlaster
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de

testcase.name: ruff@swand.lake.de
testcase.comment: The property file is used everywhere in the xmlBlaster code. The modules test their property variables in their own test cases.
